## InstrumentationEvent type

An instrumentation event emitted by services.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InstrumentationEvent = {
    type: string;
    timestamp: number;
    data: Record<string, unknown>;
    contextId?: string;
};
```

## Example


```ts
const event: InstrumentationEvent = {
  type: 'signal:write',
  timestamp: Date.now(),
  data: {
    signalId: 'abc-123',
    oldValue: 0,
    newValue: 1,
  },
};
```
